title: What is that little ward icon by my Skin shard (Hexatech  crafting)
body: Hi there I just got a new skin shard from a chest and I see this little blue ward icon in a circle on the bottom right corner. Here's a [picture](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4TYue9MXGkkVEVXbFN4Z0RheXc/view?usp=sharing) I just want to know what it means? Thanks :)

replies.body: It means that it is a legacy skin, and is only available for purchase at special times of the year.
